title: Kai
description: My name is Kai Okamoto. I deal drugs. Trade escapism for cold, hard cash.Born to a British mother and a Japanese father, I grew up poor, hungry, and alone. Hiding from the monsters at our door. The debt collectors. I’ve worked hard to escape my past. I’m not that frightened little boy anymore. I’m wealthy, secure, and sure of myself. At least I was, until I met Lily. Lily is a good girl. The kind of girl I should stay away from. I should, but I can’t.I hate lying to her, but if she finds out who I am, what I do. I won’t see her for dust.A standalone, bad boy romance, set in England.
author: Michelle  Abbott
